name: Bleak Delivery
description:
USE [TAB] AND SETTINGS TO CHANGE GAME BRIGHTNESS (ONCE FIRST DIALOGUE IS OVER)

You are a new recruit in small town delivery company but one package is missing and all deliveries must be finished, what will you decide ?

Game has two (2) slightly different endings.

Short (around 10 - 15 minutes) lovely bleaky game. Project was created to test out different features for larger upcoming game.

Game tested on following hardware:

CPU: Intel Core i5-8400 (@ 2.80 GHz)
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
memory: 16 GB

Following wonderful people did lend their voice to this project.

Radiophone voice > Zachbealetv
Butcher > DonMahLuvinLandry
Drunk > FrogTheory
Bartender > Shaun Of The Dread
Gun Shop Owner > Shiro K
